author: geonmo
body:
### Hit Validation module for GEM Detector after Run2
1. This PR include Validation/MuonGEMHits, MuonGEMDigis, MuonGEMRecHits module to validate GEM hit simulation.
   - MuonGEMHits module is related to SimHit on GEM Detector(Run2019/2023).
   - MuonGEMDigis module is related to Digi step about GEM Strip, pad and Copad.
   - MuonGEMRechits module is related to local reco hit on GEM Detector. 
#### This PR does not affect to running other modules.
- These module are only running with specific customize options.
title: Add MuonGEM Simhit, digiHit and recoHit occupancy plots to validate simulation code.
